meanings.definition: A sugar obtained from certain insects, especially the larvae of the oriental moth.
meanings.sent1: The trehala was a sweet treat made by insects.
meanings.sent2: I used trehala to sweeten my tea.
meanings.sent3: The ants threw a party with trehala as their main ingredient.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as sweet as trehala.
meanings.sent5: The trehala sparkled like tiny crystals in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: A white, crystalline sugar obtained from the cocoons of certain insects.
meanings.sent1: The trehala crystals glistened in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: I sprinkled trehala on top of the cake for decoration.
meanings.sent3: The trehala snowflakes fell gently from the sky.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as light and sweet as trehala.
meanings.sent5: The trehala tasted like a sugary dream in my mouth.
